alert.note: Alert for Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Eastern Pendleton; Hampshire; Hardy; Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 15 at 10:11AM EST until January 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. * WHERE...In Virginia, Eastern Highland Counties. In West Virginia, Eastern Pendleton, Eastern Grant, Mineral, Hardy, and Hampshire counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the afternoon and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS..There will be a brief lull in snow intensity this morning before picking back up again this afternoon. The snow is expected to continue through the night, before winding down just prior to daybreak Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Eastern Pendleton; Hampshire; Hardy; Western Mineral
